channel.title: Alching
channel.description: So I have been working on a new account, a puer mage. Yeah, they suck, but you can totally f*** up the range pure stakers with miasmic barrage and make an assload of cash. What I wanted to know is this, is there an autoclicker out there that will stay on one window? For example, Epicbot has a mouse that works on it's own. Is there an alcher like that? I want to be able to work on my server/play it while auto alching. When I use Gary's Hood clicker, it monopolizes my mouse. Help?

item.title: Alching
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:4, topic:451082”]Bots weren’t nuked. If they were nuked, Jagex would be hyping it up all over the front page.

Probably just down because of updates.[/quote]
Yeah they fixed the glitches with the icons of the items =D

Read full topic

item.title: Alching
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Umm, bots may have just been nuked, besides Powerbot has one that does do alching with it’s own mouse(like epicbot’s) but it has to update the client because runescape just updated.

Read full topic
